message: Hi Bob, I'm offering my product for $11,500. It's in excellent condition and you know it's worth a lot to you. Let me know what you think!
Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of your product, but I can only pay up to $11,000 for it. Looking forward to your response!
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still looking for a bit more.  How about $11,250?  This is a fair price considering the value you place on the product.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $11,000. I hope this meets in the middle for us.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but I'm still hoping to get closer to my asking price.  Would you be willing to go up to $11,100? This is a fair compromise, and I'm confident you'll be happy with the product.
Alice, I've considered your latest offer and am willing to go up to $11,050. I believe this is a fair price given the value of the product to me.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still hoping for a bit more. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $11,075. This is a small increase, and I'm confident you'll be satisfied with the product.
Alice, I appreciate your persistence. I am willing to consider $11,060 as a final offer. I hope this meets your expectations and allows us to move forward with the transaction.
